MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD2 postcode area of Lauder. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:31am following reports of a grounded overhead line and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:33am on the 5th of December 2020.
